question: Which Indian film won the best film award at the New York Indian Film Festival 2020 (NYIFF)?
explanation:
Malayalam movie 'Moothon' has won the best film award at the New York Indian Film Festival 2020 (NYIFF).
In addition to the best film award, Malayalam star Nivin Pauly won the best actor award and Sanjana Dipu won in the best child artist category. The Malayalam-Hindi bilingual movie was directed by Geetu Mohandas and was released in the year 2019.
